thread.title: IARI Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Young Professional & SRF Posts
thread.title_full: IARI Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Young Professional & SRF Posts

author: publisher12
title: IARI Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Young Professional & SRF Posts
text: Click here for Sr Research Fellow Post Details IARI Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Young Professional Posts: ICAR-Indian Agricultural Research Institute (IARI) has invited applications for the recruitment of Young Professional- II vacancies on temporary, contract basis. Eligible candidates may walk in interview on 17-01-2017 at 10.00 AM. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… IARI Vacancy Details: Name of the Post: Young Professional- II Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Post Graduation in Agricultural Sciences. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may appear for interview along with application, original & xerox copies of relevant certificates, recent passport size photo on 17-01-2017 at 10.00 AM. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 17-01-2017 at 10.00 AM. Venue: The Head, IARI, Regional Station, 125 ITI road, Baner Phata, Aundh, Pune- 411067. Note: This Notification has been withdrawn/ cancelled. For more details like pay scale & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Corrigendum - IARI Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Sr Research Fellow Posts: ICAR – Indian Agricultural Research Institute (IARI), New Delhi has published a notification for the recruitment of Senior Research Fellow vacancies under the Extramural Collaborative ICAR funded research project titled “Study on Sclerotinia sclerotiorum with emphasis on management of Sclerotinia rot in Brassica” in the Division of Plant Pathology on temporary basis. Eligible candidates can attend for walk in interview on 23-01-2017 at 10:00 AM. Other details like educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… IARI Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 01 Name of the Post: Senior Research Fellow Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess M.Sc in Plant Pathology/ Biotechnology/ Life Sciences with 4/ 5 years of bachelor degree or PG degree in basic sciences with 3 years Bachelor degree and 2 years of Masters degree should have qualified NET. Selection Process: Selection will be based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can attend for walk in interview along with their application giving full details of academic records, experience & attested photocopy as well as original copy of the relevant documents on 23-01-2017 at 10:00 AM. Venue details are mentioned below. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 23-01-2017 at 10:00 AM. Reporting Time: 09:30 AM. Venue: Division of Plant Pathology, IARI, New Delhi – 110012. For more details like emoluments & other information click on the link given below…
